dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: President Tokayev just spoke at the APK session, reflecting on that tragic AZAL plane crash near Aktau last December.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: President Tokayev just spoke at the A P K session, reflecting on that tragic A Z A L plane crash near Aktau last December.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev reflected on the plane crash involving AZAL near Aktau, highlighting how Kazakh citizens responded to the tragedy. Speaking at the latest session of the Assembly of the People of Kazakhstan (APK), Tokayev emphasized the unity between Kazakhstan and its neighboring countries and praised the solidarity shown by citizens during critical times.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh right, the one where the flight from Baku to Grozny couldn't land because of heavy fog, and it was diverted.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh right, the one where the flight from Baku to Grozny couldn't land because of heavy fog, and it was diverted.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Azerbaijan Airlines plane, flying from Baku (Azerbaijan) to Grozny (Russia), crashed three kilometers from Aktau at 11:30 A.M. local time on December 25. The passenger flight was unable to land in Grozny due to heavy fog, first, it was redirected to Makhachkala, and then to Aktau.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it ended up crashing just three kilometers from Aktau. Sixty-nine people on board.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it ended up crashing just three kilometers from Aktau. Sixty-nine people on board.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Azerbaijan Airlines plane, flying from Baku (Azerbaijan) to Grozny (Russia), crashed three kilometers from Aktau at 11:30 A.M. local time on December 25. According to the Ministry of Emergency Situations, there were 69 people on board, including 5 crew members: Azerbaijan Airlines also published a full list of passengers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And he highlighted how Kazakh citizens immediately rushed to help, didn't he? Like, they stood in these long lines to donate blood for the victims.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And he highlighted how Kazakh citizens immediately rushed to help, didn't he? Like, they stood in these long lines to donate blood for the victims.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Our people rushed to help the victims. They stood in long lines to donate blood.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. He said people even laid flowers at the Embassy of Azerbaijan as a sign of solidarity. The whole world noticed that unity.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. He said people even laid flowers at the Embassy of Azerbaijan as a sign of solidarity. The whole world noticed that unity.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: They laid flowers at the Embassy of Azerbaijan. The whole world was moved by the unity and selflessness of our people.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's pretty moving, honestly. In moments like that, you really see the core of a nation's character—mercy, compassion, all those values he mentioned.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's pretty moving, honestly. In moments like that, you really see the core of a nation's character-mercy, compassion, all those values he mentioned.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Mercy, compassion, and goodwill are core traits of our national character.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And he emphasized how important it is to preserve those traits, to kind of pass them down to future generations.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And he emphasized how important it is to preserve those traits, to kind of pass them down to future generations.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We must preserve these values and pass them on to future generations, Tokayev said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's a powerful reminder that even in tragedy, there's this incredible capacity for human goodness.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's a powerful reminder that even in tragedy, there's this incredible capacity for human goodness.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. That sense of community, it just… it shines through when things are at their worst.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. That sense of community, it just... it shines through when things are at their worst.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Makes you think about how interconnected we all are, especially with neighboring countries.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Makes you think about how interconnected we all are, especially with neighboring countries.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. That solidarity wasn't just local; it resonated everywhere.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. That solidarity wasn't just local; it resonated everywhere.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The whole world was moved by the unity and selflessness of our people.
